title: My friend Angelmouse
creator_credit: BBC, Silver Fox, Jackie Edwards, Graham Ralph and Mark Mason
brief_description: Meet Angelmouse, a cheeky and mischievous heaven-sent hero and his many delightful friends in these ten fun-filled adventures. Voiced by David Jason, these charming tales are best suited for children aged 3-5 years. Episodes include: My friend Angelmouse; Lost Thingamajig; Windy weather day; Trumpet; Baby Ellie’s Presents; Angelcake; Copycat chick; Angelmouse’s day off; A Visitor for Angelmouse; Angelmouse’s reward.
